title: Healthy Homes and Buildings All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: To effect policy change to tackle health and wellbeing problems caused by poor quality, damp, noisy, badly lit, poorly ventilated and inefficient homes and buildings and embed health and wellbeing principles in future legislation to ensure the UK’s homes and buildings positively benefit the occupants’ health and wellbeing.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 7160.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Gill Morris, Healthy Homes and Buildings Coalition. Tel: 07976 263 869
contact_details.secretariat: Healthy Homes and Buildings Coalition (via Jade Advocacy Limited) acts as the group's secretariat.

detailed_benefits.Source: Healthy Homes and Buildings Coalition (via Jade Advocacy Limited)
